data.title: Who Is Jenn Goicoechea?
data.meta_description: Usher was first romantically linked to his now-wife Jennifer Goicoechea in 2019. Get to know her and their history.
data.text:
Grammy award-winning musical artist Usher was first romantically linked to his girlfriend Jennifer Goicoechea in 2019 when they were photographed at the 40th birthday party of their mutual friend, producer Keith Thomas. Since then, their relationship has gotten very serious and includes two children. They‚Äôre very open about their relationship online, but Usher is more in the spotlight. Goicoechea, meanwhile, is a very successful industry exec behind the scenes.

Here‚Äôs everything to know about Goicoechea and her relationship to the ‚ÄúOMG‚Äù singer.

Who is Jenn Goicoechea?

Goicoechea was born and raised in Miami. From high school, she moved to another Florida institution, studying recording arts at Full Sail University in Winter Park. Her mother, Barbara, was the director of operations at ACT Productions, beginning in 1988. Goicoechea shadowed her mom at the event and multimedia production company, which eventually led to her working as an assistant to Ciara.

She headed to California and opened her management company, Boogs‚ÄôN‚ÄôEffect Management. She eventually became the senior vice president of A&R at Epic Records. In both 2020 and 2021, Goicoechea was named one of Billboard‚Äôs R&B/Hip-Hop Power Players.

Did Goicoechea and Usher really get married on Super Bowl Sunday?

Yes. People reports the couple tied the knot on Feb. 11, 2024. They got married at Vegas Weddings‚Äô Terrace Gazebo, an outdoor wedding chapel. Usher‚Äôs mother, Jonetta Patton, was their witness.

‚ÄúWe can confirm that Usher and Jennifer Goicoechea took the next step in their relationship and did get married on Sunday night in Las Vegas surrounded by close friends and family,‚Äù a rep told the outlet. ‚ÄúThey both look forward to continuing to raise their children together surrounded by love and thank everyone for the well wishes.‚Äù

On March 16, 2024, Usher shared a little bit about his big day. While speaking with Entertainment Tonight at the 55th annual NAACP Image Awards, he admitted that his Vegas wedding to Goicoechea was a surprise to his entire family.

‚ÄúIt was an incredible moment that we felt was great for us,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúIt was a button at the end of an incredible Las Vegas run. My mother was there, her mother was there, the kids were there, our immediate family was there. Matter of fact, everybody was surprised. I‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòNo, no, no, we‚Äôre having a wedding right now. We‚Äôre gonna go have Elvis officiate us.‚Äô‚Äù

When did Goicoechea and Usher get engaged?

It isn‚Äôt known publicly.

People did reveal that the couple received a marriage license in Clark County, Nevada on Thursday, Feb. 8, 2024, ahead of Usher‚Äôs Super Bowl halftime show. They had not yet filed it, so it was unclear, heading into the Super Bowl, if they secretly got married.

How did Goicoechea and Usher meet?

It‚Äôs likely that she met Usher through her work and industry social circle. It seems like she may have been a fan and friend for a while, because in 2016, she shared a picture of herself whispering in his ear, writing in the caption, ‚ÄúNot sure what I‚Äôm saying or who I‚Äôm speaking too üôÑüòÇ But my nails look good.‚Äù

She also shared an older photo including him in 2018.

In October 2019, a few months after Keith Thomas‚Äô party, they were seen kissing backstage at the Hollywood Bowl. In December, they were stepping out officially as a couple and went to Sean ‚ÄúDiddy‚Äù Combs‚Äô birthday in Los Angeles, where Usher was performing.

Do Usher and Goicoechea have any kids?

Usher confirmed the news that he and his girlfriend were expecting during an appearance on Good Morning America in 2020. He also announced his planned Las Vegas residency during the interview.

‚ÄúBabies always bring such joy to a family and [I‚Äôm] really excited for my young one‚Äîwell, my bean‚Äôs arrival,‚Äù he said.

Their daughter Sovereign Bo was born on September 24, just a few weeks later. Sharing a picture of her little hand wrapped around his, Usher wrote in the caption, ‚ÄúWe are feeling blessed and full of love with the arrival of our beautiful baby girl, Sovereign Bo Raymond. ‚ÄòIsn‚Äôt She Lovely‚Äô by Stevie Wonder on repeat.‚Äù

Their second child arrived in 2021. Sire Castrello was born on September 29, and Usher shared a sneak peak at the boy‚Äôs face, writing, ‚ÄúHi my name is Sire Castrello Raymond ‚Ä¶ I am the newest addition to the Raymond crew. I was born Sept 29 2021 at 6:42pm weighting 7lbs 13oz. Hear me roar ‚Ä¶ A.K.A Ra Ra . üë∂üèΩ ‚ôéÔ∏è Gang.‚Äù

Usher has two other children with his ex-wife Tameka Foster, two boys named Usher ‚ÄúCinco‚Äù V and Naviyd Ely. While appearing on The Late Late Show with James Corden, Usher talked about the challenges of growing his family while COVID-19 kept everyone at home.

‚ÄúI think everybody‚Äôs had the opportunity to take a beat back and realize what really matters in this time‚Äîit‚Äôs family,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt is coming closer to your loved ones and appreciating the ones that you have while you have them.‚Äù

He added, ‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs been a tough time for everybody, so [it‚Äôs] great to have this incredible news, this new arrival. Really anticipating it.‚Äù

What has Usher said about Goicoechea?

In a November 2023 interview with People, Usher offered some rare insight into his relationship.

‚ÄúI have an amazing partner, a support system,‚Äù he said of Goicoechea. ‚ÄúWe have any amazing dynamic between our relationship where I‚Äôm able to be passionate still about what I do and have an incredible partner to work through some of the harder times as a young man dealing with children and dealing with the dynamic of how you communicate with them.‚Äù

He called Goicoechea his closest friend, saying, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm very happy, very fortunate to have an incredible friend, not just a partner. She‚Äôs my best friend, and I love her.‚Äù
